item.title: Vaccine skeptic Bolsonaro gets a pass at UN but not New York restaurants
item.description: Unvaccinated heads of state attending the United Nation General Assembly this week may have to settle for a slice of pizza on a sidewalk instead of fine dining at New York's restaurants.

item.title: Two injured in shooting at US high school - police
item.description: Two people were injured in a shooting at a high school in the US state of Virginia on Monday, officials said, providing no further details as police rushed to the scene.

item.title: Still no ayuda given to those in granular lockdowns
item.description: More than 3,000 Filipino families are affected by granular lockdowns but financial aid coming from the national government has yet to be disbursed to them.

item.title: 'Giant' baby ng Butuan City, instant celebrity nang iuwi sa kanilang bahay
item.description: Instant celebrity sa kanilang lugar sa Butuan City ang "dambuhalang" sanggol na si Baby Mark na isinilang na may bigat na 11 pounds. Kumusta na nga ba siya at ang kaniyang ina?

item.title: American fugitive nabbed in Bohol town
item.description: An American national wanted for violation of his probation was arrested in Bohol on Monday afternoon, Sept. 20.

item.title: Philippines receives highest volume of vaccines in a week; majority made by Sinovac
item.description: In his presentation in the President's weekly Talk to the People, Galvez said the majority of vaccine doses delivered were manufactured by Sinovac, with five million doses. This was followed by Pfizer with 2,774,070 doses; Moderna with 961,000; AstraZeneca with 661,200 and 190,000 Sputnik V second dose.

item.title: Batang naligaw noong 1989, makauwi na kaya sa kaniyang pamilya?
item.description: Ilang linggo matapos maitampok sa "Kapuso Mo, Jessica Soho" ang kuwento ni Alvin Bachli na nawala noong 1989, ilang pamilya ang nagpahayag na posibleng sila ang hinahanap nitong kaanak. Matapos na kaya ang paghahanap ni Alvin, na 38-anyos na ngayon.

item.title: In attack vs. Gordon, Duterte tells DOH to probe Red Cross false positives
item.description: President Rodrigo Duterte on Monday night asked the Department of Health to investigate the alleged "false positives" among the COVID-19 tests conducted by the Philippine Red Cross.

item.title: Philippines receives US-donated 561,500 additional Pfizer COVID-19 doses
item.description: The national government on Monday night welcomed the arrival of 561,500 more doses of American-made Pfizer COVID-19 vaccines.

item.title: COVID-19 deaths in Bohol breach 400-mark
item.description: The public is urged to follow minimum health standards such as wearing of face masks and observance of physical distancing as there is an increase in COVID-19 deaths in Bohol province.

item.title: US to end travel bans for vaccinated passengers early November --official
item.description: The United States announced Monday it will lift COVID-19 travel bans on all air passengers in November if they are fully vaccinated and undergo testing and contact tracing.

item.title: Duterte warns of trouble in government if officials detained by Gordon, Senate
item.description: President Rodrigo Duterte on Monday threatened that there will be "trouble in government" if his Cabinet officials were ordered detained by the Senate, which is conducting a probe into the "overpriced" COVID-19 supply procurement.

item.title: Lalaking naglalakad sa gilid ng kalsada, patay nang magulungan ng 14-wheeler truck
item.description: Patay ang isang 18-anyos na lalaki nang magulungan siya ng hulihang gulong ng isang 14-wheeler truck sa Tondo, Maynila.

item.title: Leaders of ecumenical group calls for peace amid COVID-19 pandemic
item.description: The Philippine Ecumenical Peace Platform has called on the government to prioritize the country's need for "transformative healing" amid the COVID-19 pandemic.

item.title: Duktora, patay matapos pagbabarilin sa garahe ng kaniyang bahay
item.description: Isang 53-anyos na duktora ang nasawi matapos siyang pagbabarilin habang nagbibigay ng reseta sa garahe ng kaniyang bahay sa Pilar, Abra.
